Class AreaModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • AreaModel

  • public class AreaModel
extends java.lang.Object
    The AreaModel class represents the game area where the player moves and encounters creatures. It contains information about the area, such as its number, dimensions, and the player's position. Additionally, it handles encounters and provides getters and setters for its properties.
